text: It takes a generation to really be distinguished  says Luder of a friend of modest origin who has polished herself and cumbered. If you look at her carefully, you realize she must be extremely attentive because, to the slightest negligence, she takes on the tail of vulgarity. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 85
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
